类 com.radius.server.packet.RadiusPacket
的使用

使用 RadiusPacket 的软件包
com.radius.server.packet This package contains classes for encoding and decoding Radius packets. 
com.radius.server.proxy This package contains classes that can be used to implement a proxying Radius server using TinyRadius. 
com.radius.server.test This package contains sample applications that show how to use TinyRadius. 
com.radius.server.util This package contains helper classes for implementing Radius clients and servers. 
 

com.radius.server.packet 中 RadiusPacket 的使用

          This class represents an Access-Request Radius packet.
 class AccountingRequest
          This class represents a Radius packet of the type "Accounting-Request".
